snippet: Amid the national debate over regulation, women’s participation in shooting sports has surged in the last decade, while many gun dealers said the number of female customers went up in 2011.
abstract: Women’s participation in shooting sports has surged over the last decade, and gun manufacturers have responded, increasingly gearing advertising toward women, and  marketing special firearms models with smaller frames, custom colors, and accessories; female gun owners often learn to shoot as a statement of independence and personal power rather than as hobby or a means for self-defense.
lead_paragraph: Amid the national debate over regulation, women’s participation in shooting sports has surged in the last decade, while many gun dealers said the number of female customers went up in 2011.

headline.seo: Rising Voice of Gun Ownership Is Female
headline.main: Rising Voice of Gun Ownership Is Female
headline.print_headline: Rising Voice of Gun Ownership Is Female
